Description:
Detects execution of the Add-In deployment cache updating utility (AddInutil.exe) with uncommon Addinroot or Pipelineroot paths. An adversary may execute AddinUtil.exe with uncommon Addinroot/Pipelineroot paths that point to the adversaries Addins.Store payload.


Author: Michael McKinley (@McKinleyMike), Tony Latteri (@TheLatteri)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Uncommon AddinUtil.EXE CommandLine Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\addinutil.exe' and original_file_name = 'addinutil.exe') and (command like '%-addinroot:%' or command like '%-pipelineroot:%')) and  not (command like '%-addinroot:"c:\program files (x86)\common files\microsoft shared\vsta%' or command like '%-addinroot:c:\program files (x86)\common files\microsoft shared\vsta%' or command like '%-pipelineroot:"c:\program files (x86)\common files\microsoft shared\vsta%' or command like '%-pipelineroot:c:\program files (x86)\common files\microsoft shared\vsta%'))
